column1: You come across a crossroad in the forest. One road leads towards home; one road leads towards adventure.
You are handed an eyeball - you know who it belongs to. If you take it - you will be able to see the the 4th colour.
In a world without spring which season would be your favourite?
You can be provided the keys to be a pioneer in a specific field. Which do you choose?
You feel a mysterious hand on your shoulder.  You know it is a monsterous prescence. What do you do?
column4: Melt into the living room floor

column1: You are trapped in a coffin. Which animal would you transform into to escape?
You are sailing out to sea to venture to uncharted territory. What do you head for on the horizon?
Do you find that your sleep is often filled more with dreams or nightmares?
You stumble upon an ancient time machine - to where would you travel?
